title: Couple With Heart Person Man Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple With Heart Man Diverse Skin Tones
description: Illustrates a couple, one of whom is a man with a light skin tone and the other a man with a dark skin tone, united by a heart symbol. This emoji signifies love, romantic relationships, and partnerships with diverse skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this touching emoji showcases a loving couple, a man with a light skin tone and another man with a dark skin tone, embracing with a vibrant red heart floating between them. Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the figures a warm, approachable feel with soft, rounded edges. The heart, a symbol of deep affection and unity, is rendered with a polished finish, making this emoji a powerful representation of love and partnership in digital conversations on Apple devices.
